text: Pablo García Moreno (born 30 May 1985) is a Spanish footballer who plays for CP Villarrobledo as a right back.José Carlos renueva en Villarrobledo y se anuncia el fichaje de Pablo García‚ cadenaser.com, 28 June 2017 ==Football career== Born in Albacete, Castilla-La Mancha, García graduated from Albacete Balompié's youth setup, and made his debuts as a senior with the reserves in the 2004–05 campaign, in Tercera División. He made his first team – and La Liga – debut on 6 March 2005, starting in a 1–3 away loss against Athletic Bilbao.Guerrero logra su gol 100 en otra remontada del Athletic (Guerrero scores his 100th goal in another Athletic comeback); El Mundo Deportivo, 7 March 2005 In the 2006 summer García moved to Segunda División B side Orihuela CF. He resumed his career in the third and fourth levels in the following years, representing CD Roquetas,El CD Roquetas refuerza su defensa con la incorporación de Pablo García (CD Roquetas bolsters defense with the signing of Pablo García); Ideal, 16 June 2009 CD Teruel,Pablo Garcia, defensa del Roquetas, primer fichaje del CD Teruel (Pablo García, Roquetas' defender, first signing of CD Teruel); Eco de Teruel, 29 June 2011 Bakú Hellín Deportivo, UD AlmansaLa U.D.Almansa se hace con los servicios del lateral Pablo García (U.D. Almansa takes the services of full-back Pablo García); Balón Parado, 5 July 2013 and La Roda CF.Pablo García deja la UD Almansa y ficha por La Roda CF (Pablo García leaves UD Almansa and signs for La Roda CF); Almansa Deporte, 24 June 2014 ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Albacete Category:Spanish footballers Category:Castilian-Manchegan footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:La Liga players Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Atlético Albacete players Category:Albacete Balompié players Category:Orihuela CF players Category:CD Teruel footballers Category:La Roda CF players
title: Pablo García (Spanish footballer)
